entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Markham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
